title: Tropical peat soil changes across successive oil palm generations in Sarawak, Malaysia

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Jicqueline Ratai, Christopher Boon Sung Teh, Ngai Paing Tan, Hasmah Mohidin, Kah Joo Goh, Faustina Elfrida Sangok, Lulie Melling
